= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *PCA.SPL* || Superior parietal lobule || Spatial orientation || Posterior parietal cortex ||
|| *PCA.IPL* || Inferior parietal lobule || Perception of emotions in facial stimuli and interpretation of sensory information || Posterior parietal cortex ||
|| *PCA.IPS* || Intraparietal Sulcus || Perceptual-motor coordination and visual attention || Directing eye movements and reaching ||
|| *PCA.RSC* || Retrosplenial Cortex || Processing of emotionally salient stimuli || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.PCN* || Precuneus Cortex || Representation of the self || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.PCG* || Posterior Cingulate Cortex || Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval || Medial parietal lobe ||

= Groupings and Subdivisions  =

  * PCA.IPS is divided into MIP, LIP, VIP, AIP
